feed.title: Gabefgonc Blog
feed.subtitle: Hi, my name is Gabriel Franco, in this blog i'm going to post some tutorials and other things about the technologies i'm using.

entry.title: How my downloader works and why you should use it

link.title: How my downloader works and why you should use it

entry.content:
I created a python script called Downloader, which exposes files in some directory to download. It is very simple, but useful. You can change the page title, exclude some files from the list, and, obviously, change the directory that contains the files you want to serve.

How does it work
entry.summary: I created a python script called Downloader, which exposes files in some directory to download. It is very simple, but useful. You can change the page title, exclude some files from the list, and, obviously, change the directory that contains the files you want to serve.
